choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
### Assistant:

Here is a sample meal plan for the week that meets your dietary restrictions:

Breakfast:

Banana smoothie made with bananas, blueberries, and almond milk
Oatmeal with sliced strawberries and raspberries
Gluten-free toast with avocado and tomato slices
Lunch:

Vegetable soup made with carrots, celery, potatoes, and onions
Tuna salad made with canned tuna, celery, and mayonnaise (make sure the mayonnaise is dairy-free)
Gluten-free crackers or bread
Fruit salad made with apples, grapes, and kiwis
Dinner:

Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as sweet potatoes, carrots, and Brussels sprouts)
Quinoa with mixed vegetables and a side of brown rice
Vegetable stir-fry made with broccoli, bell peppers, and tofu
Fruit salad made with mangoes, peaches, and pineapple
Snacks:

Baked sweet potato fries
Hummus and veggie sticks (carrots, celery, and bell peppers)
Gluten-free crackers or bread
Fresh fruit such as apples, bananas, and berries
It is important to note that this meal plan is just a sample and can be adjusted based on your individual preferences and dietary needs. It is also essential to make sure you are getting enough calories and nutrients each day, so it's a good idea to consult with a healthcare professional or registered dietitian for personalized advice.
